name: Swordsman Of Persia: Ancient Story
storyline: The protagonist is named Bahram, who lives in a small town called Khavarshahr. One day he goes on a mission, but when he returns, he sees that his city has been invaded and the invaders have killed many people and taken others captive along with the king's daughter. Bahram then embarks on an adventurous journey to seek revenge as well as frees his people.
summary: An action/platformer game, centering around the protagonist Bahram going on a journey to seek revenge after his home city is invaded.
